doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Madhusudan Saha
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Madhusudan Saha is a Gastroenterologist in Sylhet. His qualification is MBBS, MD (Gastroenterology). Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Madhusudan Saha at Popular Medical Center, Sylhet is 3pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).
